answers.author: Shatha AlSaket
answers.text:
In Jordan we can transfer amounts from another bank account electronically but we cant through a credit card because its considered a loan from  your bank so it would look like a fraud. That's in Jordan my country.

author: Mark Abeles-Allison
text:
ICMA printed an article from Washoe County, NV. in 2010 about E-Payables.  Savings were highlighted through credit card incentives and time/material savings. 
I am wondering how many other communities currently pay Accounts Payable electronically and how it is working?
Thanks.
title: E-Payables or AP via ACH
